fields.description: It would be much more convenient to use L("textid") in a .tss file than expr(L("textid")) to add internationalized strings in my file. This addition is necessary to support hintText, which doesn't have a "textid" equivalent like other UI components. Alternatively, you could implement a hinttextid attribute for TextField & TextArea.
fields.summary: As a developer, I'd like to be able to use L() in TSS files to simplify using i18n strings in my app
